article_node.title: Prince William and Harryâ€™s cousin Lady Kitty Spencer, 34, spotted with rarely seen billionaire husband, 66, in Saint Tropez
article_node.summary: Lady Kitty Spencer was seen enjoying a summer day in Saint Tropez with her mother and husband, Michael Lewis, as they dined at Club 55. The couple, married for five years and parents to a daughter named Athena, have kept their personal life relatively private. Meanwhile, Lady Eliza Spencer, Kitty's sister, recently got engaged to Channing Millerd after a decade of dating, although their father, Charles Spencer, has not publicly acknowledged the engagement, sparking rumors of family tensions.
